mapper.select: SELECT state AS state, COUNT(1) AS amount FROM deploy WHERE 1 = 1 AND tenant_code = #{tenantCode} GROUP BY state
SELECT shop_code AS shopCode, COUNT(1) AS amount FROM machine WHERE 1 = 1 AND tenant_code = #{tenantCode} GROUP BY shop_code LIMIT 5

SELECT order_created_day AS orderCreatedDay, SUM(total) AS amount FROM ( SELECT order_created_day, SUM(amount) AS total FROM order_tea_report_by_shop WHERE 1 = 1 AND tenant_code = #{tenantCode} GROUP BY order_created_day ORDER BY order_created_day DESC LIMIT 14 ) AS tmpTab GROUP BY order_created_day

SELECT tea_code AS teaCode, SUM(amount) AS amount FROM order_tea_report_by_shop WHERE 1 = 1 AND tenant_code = #{tenantCode} AND order_created_day >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY tea_code ORDER BY order_created_day DESC

SELECT topping_code AS toppingCode, SUM(amount) AS amount FROM order_topping_report_by_shop WHERE 1 = 1 AND tenant_code = #{tenantCode} AND order_created_day >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY topping_code ORDER BY amount DESC

SELECT spec_item_code AS specItemCode, SUM(amount) AS amount FROM order_specitem_report_by_shop WHERE 1 = 1 AND tenant_code = #{tenantCode} AND order_created_day >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY spec_item_code ORDER BY amount DESC
